tags.name: lrn-aside
tags.description:
`lrn-aside`
A content aside as a panel

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title for the aside.

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Apply CSS sticky styling

  * `direction` {`string`} - Direction to hang off UI if sticky, left or right.

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title for the aside.

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Apply CSS sticky styling

  * `direction` {`string`} - Direction to hang off UI if sticky, left or right.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description:
`title` {`string`} - Title for the aside.

Property: title

Default: Related content

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description:
`sticky` {`boolean`} - Apply CSS sticky styling

Property: sticky

Default: false

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description:
`direction` {`string`} - Direction to hang off UI if sticky, left or right.

Property: direction

Default:
